cab.content:
SECRET
G.T. 408
WAR CABINET
AMERICAN REPRESENTATION AT ALLIED CONFERENCE TO BE HELD IN PARIS IN SECOND WEEK IN MAY
It is thought that the following Press Cable, which has been suppressed by the Press Bureau, may interest Members of the War Cabinet. I have suggested to the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs that he should make a representation to the Government of the U.S.A., representing the danger involved in publicity in regard to journeys such as that referred to.
(Sgd.) M.P.A. HANKEY
No.7215
NEW YORK
11th April, 1917
C145 worlds Ex Washington unistates intends send Parisward for conference Allies second week may commission Colonel House probablest heading associated with financier international lawyer high army navy officers step conference initiated by Britain France Italy Russia several days ago stop after Conference France send Committee unistatesward Consisting Joffre Foch Vivian Octavo Howberg and Admiral to be selected.
EXCHANGE.
2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
11th April, 1917
